MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the WA16 postcode area of Knutsford, affecting customers on Stubbs Lane. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 5.45PM. Our engineers have established that there is a faulty piece of equipment on the overhead line network and that repairs will be complex so we are awaiting delivery of generators to restore power, and this should happen by 11.30PM. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9.21PM on 3rd January 2021
